11.title: You find a ring and you get transported to Soni...

111.content:
I was walking to school. I was humming a tune.
Then I saw a ring.
"Where did that ring come from?" I asked myself. "Oh well."
I went to pick it up.
The everything went black.
111.title: Maisie

choices: I actually had woken up in Sonic's hand (different storyline)

I woke up a few hours later with a splitting headache. I saw that I was tiny. I was in the city
Maisie: Oh great.

11111.content:
I saw sonic coming towards me.
Maisie: SONIC!!! DOWN HERE!!! SONIC!!

111111.content:
He didn't hear me.
Maisie: SONIC!!!!!!!!
111111.title: Continue

1111111.content: Maisie: OH FOR GOODNESS SAKE!! SONIC!!!!
1111111.title: Continue

114.content:
As you walked through an alley on your way back home, something sparkles off to the corner. Taking a closer look you found a surprisingly clean looking ring by a few garbage cans. Picking it up, your vision blurred.

When you came to, you found yourself in a more rural looking area with tall grass the the sounds of waves crashing in the distance. Suddenly a shadow loomed over you as _____ walked past.
114.title: Jack

You were just a normal guy, with a normal life. Well, except that you had water powers.
But you were quite normal.

Today baxter was walking to the bus stop to catch his bus today as he was ready to he began to snicker evily "someone is going to have a bad day today...hehehehehe" he said in a evil typical voice that his plan is to bully & troll people, as. e keeps walking he notices a ring on the ground "The !@$/ is this thing a ring??" he said as he picks it up & it started to glow & blind baxter which causing him to collasp on the ground.

1153121.content:
Baxter had woken up but his vision was blurry he looked around while on his hands & knees, then had to adjust his glasses and can still feel his mustache & a halfy beard still on "Where am i??" he said looking around hinself he appeared to be in a forest he got up with an angered tone of expression on his face "what is this place!!!!" he said in an anger voice then after that he began to walk in the forest.

Suddenly he hears a gun target on him as he stops and hears it after that he turns around & sees an Eggpod pointing a gun at him, this makes baxter grin evily "So...you wanna know who's next do ya!" he said as he began to get inti a fighting position "Your Next!" he said then the robot began to blast a shot this made baxter get confused "What the?" he said as he then falls on his back to duck "Okay so being much of a troller can be easy but fighting can get hard hehehe!" he said as he then begans to Spear the eggpod down & beat it up wisely and then he was ready to rip the robot's head off but was stopped by an unknown attack to the back and he was sent flyong into a tree and then he slided down from it "Ow!!!! !@#$!!!!!!!" He screamed in pain & looked back was known as another eggman ally "So theres 2 heh...." he said trying to get up to stretch his back. "it's on lets play!!!!" he said ad he started the attack first by hitting both with the stick & pushing the stick down on there throats but saw more spawning around him "How many are you are there!!!" He said in an anger tone of voice.

Finally he was tackled down baxter trying to block each punch & each kick by them but one hit him in the grpin and he holded on to them & was getting beaten up as well before getting k.o.'d his head started to hurt as he fainted once again

where was he?
1153121.title: Welcome to the sonic world

The human himself baxter wakes up but something was different as he tries to get up he fell on his back trying to get up again "where....qm i" he said trying to get up and he did get back on his feet he looks around him which is huge sees that hes in the bedroom of someones house he has continued to have head pains from earlier today

"What is this place!!" he said looking around as he did he began to walk all around the room to look at more of the room he began to worry hard "I think i went too far!" he said in a afraid tone he began to breathe hard thinking this is the nightmare & wanting to wake up now.

When Suddenly...

12.content: Who lands in Lilliput first?
12.title: The sonic gang land in lilliput

choices: Manic and some kids (Maisie, Newt, Jack, Roxy and Minho)
1251.content:
Manic was on a boat with his brother Sonic and his friends. Sonia was there.
The girls were sunbathing.Sonic and the other boys were talking.
Manic looked around.

Then a storm started. The waves started getting choppy. The passengers started getting up and walking inside. Manic started walking to go inside. Suddenly a giant wave washed over him pulling him into the sea.

"MANIC!!" shouted Sonic.

Manic swam for shore, keeping his head above the water. He finnally got to shore. He was tired, wet and alone.

He walked for 30 seconds then collasped asleep.
1251.title: Manic

choices: Go warn the king, queen and princess
12512.content:
Some kids were walking on the beach. They were called Maisie, Newt, Jack, Roxy and Minho.
Newt crashed into Manic's ankle.
"Ow!" Newt said.
"Are you okay?" Maisie asked, helping him up.
"Yeah, I banged into something." Newt replied.
"Guys, look!" Minho said.
"It's a giant hedgehog!" Roxy said.
"What should we do?" Jack asked.
12512.title: Manic and some kids (Maisie, Newt, Jack, Roxy a...

125121.content:
"Lets go warn the king, queen and princess." Maisie nodded.
The others nodded.
125121.title: Go warn the king, queen and princess

choices: The ray malfunctions, and Tails gets shrunk! (Unwilling shrinking)
The ray shrinks the apple! Tails then shrinks himself (Willing shrinking)
The ray doesn't fire at all, Tails gets shrunk later.
1412.content:
"I've finished it!"
Tails screamed in excitement and relief. He was working on a new invention for a long time, and he finally finished it. It was a shrink ray!
"Now, just to test this thing out."
Tails pointed the ray at an apple laying on the table, and fired.
